name: AMOK - Berzerk but a side scroller
name_original: AMOK - Berzerk but a side scroller
description:
This is a remake of the good ol arcade game, Berzerk, but with a different perspective.

Controls

  • Arrows to move
  • Space to jump
  • X key to shoot

Easy controls eh!?
BTW this game is named AMOK, as AMOK is a synonym of Berzerk :}
Anyways, share ur score in the comments below :}

This Game is Made with Godot game engine, by me along with RetroRSP 
Online Leaderboards powered by LootLocker.io
